function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Differences in outbreak handling between developing and developed countries","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of information on competing financial interests or personal relationships","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Dependence on government enforcement of social isolation measures","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on travel bans and stay-home orders as primary public health initiatives","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hierarchical diffusion within countries from globalized cities","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gathering data from 30 participants may not be representative of the entire construction industry in the uk.","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Sampling technique for population selection","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of critical reflections on the importance of cities and how they are governed","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Failure of state-centric initiatives","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Fragmented urban governance","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicting priorities of different government levels","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited local independence and high reliance on central government for coordination","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proactive planning and emergency plans in bangladesh","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Neglect of border closure policies by rich urbanites","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limitation of uniform strategies for covid-19 mitigation","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on smart city initiatives for pandemic response","category":"Global coordination challenges","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of drones for monitoring compliance with social distancing measures and detecting potentially infected individuals","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased spread of misinformation and fake news related to the pandemic","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of facial recognition technology to verify compliance with self-quarantine rules","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation through online communication platforms","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforcement of strict quarantine measures through tracing and monitoring apps","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on smart solutions such as surveillance systems and positioning technology may infringe on individual privacy and civil liberties.","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of fake news complicating crisis management","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of crises such as covid-19","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fragmented governance and limited cooperation between different sectors and levels of governance","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Timely implementation of border control and closure of land and sea mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to advance vaccines and treatments due to lack of collaboration between medical and non-medical disciplines","category":"Lack of global governance
